product_name: AG CareFirewall Argan Shine & Flat Iron Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackSlip your flat iron seamlessly through your hair while helping protect from heat, add shine and reduce flyaways with AG Care Smooth Firewall Argan Shine & Flat Iron Spray.
details: DetailsBenefitsShields against heat damageSmooths flyawaysEnhances high shine + slipKey IngredientsArgan oilFormulated WithoutSulfatePABAParabenGlutenDEAAnimal testingItem 2600013How To UseMist lightly prior to applying heat or use as a finishing spray for maximum shine.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Isododecane, Butane, Dimethicone, C13-15 Alkane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, LinaloolShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Mist lightly prior to applying heat or use as a finishing spray for maximum shine.

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: I have purchased this item twice and I used it until the end. Great but expensive, but I understand why.

reviews.headline: Sprayer  needs changed
reviews.comments: The spray does not come out straight. It drips down makes a mess.  This is wasteful and has happened with numerous bottles.  I will not be buying any more.

reviews.headline: Game changerr
reviews.comments: I have fine, bleached hair and while this can make your car oily you just have to be mindful of how powerful the product is. I spray it on my hands then rub those together and run my fingers through my hair. It distributes the product better and not so much waste falling on the ground. Yes you have a little on your hands but not much.

reviews.headline: Game changerr
reviews.comments: I have fine, bleached hair and while this can make your car oily you just have to be mindful of how powerful the product is. I spray it on my hands then rub those together and run my fingers through my hair. It distributes the product better and not so much waste falling on the ground. Yes you have a little on your hands but not much.

reviews.headline: stay away if you have fine/greasy/oily hair!!
reviews.comments: this product smells great and does add shine to your hair! HOWEVER - it also is an argan oil based product which definitely makes hair appear more oily/greasy after use. I would recommend this is as a finishing spray BUT only to be applied on the ends to add shine and NOT as heat protection on full hair shaft

reviews.headline: Not for fine hair texture!!
reviews.comments: I have a lot of wavy fine-texture hair and DO NOT recommend this for anyone with a fine hair texture; it is SO greasy. I couldnt do anything with my hair after spraying a little bit on. I had to rewash (and double wash) all my hair after just finishing blow drying. Yuck. The smell is awful too.

reviews.headline: My Favorite
reviews.comments: I have used this in and off for awhile but recently started using it consistently. I have recently experienced problems with the spray nozzle, but I still love the product so much I was willing to put up with the issues. I have short, fine hair and even though I've seen reviews stating this doesn't work with my type of hair. I'm glad I already used the product, because I probably wouldn't have bought it after reading the reviews. I use it when my hair is still wet before blow drying. Then I spray again and before using my straightener. It seems to give my hair body and shine. Some days after blow drying I can even manage to style without using the straightener. I also spray a little after finishing my styling…after using hairspray. I really love this and feel ot is making my hair look and feel healthier. I don't want to ever run out!

reviews.headline: Love it but hate it
reviews.comments: Firewall works great, however I have never had a product that leaves such a mess in my hands and on the counter. More product is lost than actually gets applied. It works great, but its not worth the frustration. At first I thought it was an isolated case of a defective can, but i have tried 3-4 times over and every can leaks. Fix this and I'd be a fan.

reviews.headline: Gamechanger!!
reviews.comments: Let me just preface this review by saying this is NOT for thin/fine hair. It is quite literally an oil spray and has to be used very sparingly & intentionally. I have very wavy, frizzy hair and live in Florida. I used to envy strangers with perfect blowouts in this humidity and wonder how they did it… Look no further!! This product is amazing if used correctly. I use it with a thermal round brush to help the smoothing process and seal out frizz. Afterwards you can over over with a curling iron and finishing spray. The results are amazing i'm telling you!! If you have curly hair and live in a hot climate, this is a must have. Be careful though, a little goes a long way. If you over do it in some spots just just a little dry shampoo to soak up excess oil.

reviews.headline: Love the product but the spray goes everywhere.
reviews.comments: I love this product for my hair however, about 1/2 way through the bottle the spray doesn't work like it did. It sprays all over including my hands and my shirt. I had to wash my shirt right away with a stain remover because the spray stayed on my shirt. If you buy this just don't spray it on your hair with clothes on.

reviews.headline: Love the spray but…
reviews.comments: They need to improve the nozzle. It ALWAYS leaks on evey bottle i buy.

reviews.headline: Spray mess
reviews.comments: Used to love love love this but the last 4 bottles i have purchased just leak instead of spray. It just runs all over My hands and down the bottle. I would say at least 1/4-1/2 of the bottle is wasted from leaking and when it does spray it isnt even . I would relly like to use this again if they can fix the spray nossel issue.

reviews.headline: One of my favorite heat protectants!
reviews.comments: If have fine hair like me, try spraying on damp hair. Game changer and dont over spray for setting your hair

reviews.headline: AG Care firewall spray nozzle
reviews.comments: I like AG Care Firewall, but the spray nozzle malfunctions. I had it happen on 2 different ones. Cant buy it unless that is corrected. Just wssting your money

reviews.headline: buy this if you want to look like an oil slick
reviews.comments: why is this so greasy? gross. Will be returning unfortunately

reviews.headline: Made my fine hair look dirty
reviews.comments: I got this spray to use to protect my hair before I straighten it.  I usually use living proof or dry bar. Ill be going back to one of them, as im not a fan of the smell or the way my hair looks dirty after i just washed. Yes it does make my hair shiny but wuth my fine hair its more like i havent washed my hair in 3 days.

reviews.headline: USED TO be my favorite
reviews.comments: This used to be my favorite heat protectant, but recently the spray nozzles have been really bad. It sprays more on my hand than on my hair. I thought it was a faulty bottle, but even after returning one can and buying another, the issue persists. Super annoyed since I love the formula. Buyer beware, the spray nozzle design is defective. Until this changes, it's not even worth buying.

reviews.headline: Changed
reviews.comments: Been using for long time. Just got new can and so disappointed.  Smells different and greasy.

reviews.headline: Not the same
reviews.comments: This was my go to product and they changed the formula and now it smells like something you spray in your tires. So disappointing…

reviews.headline: Smooth and shiny
reviews.comments: This product helps with frizz to create smooth and shiny finish. Just use sparingly or it can make hair look greasy if you use too much.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used this in and off for awhile but recently started using it consistently. I have recently experienced problems with the spray nozzle, but I still love the product so much I was willing to put up with the issues. I have short, fine hair and even though I've seen reviews stating this doesn't work with my type of hair. I'm glad I already used the product, because I probably wouldn't have bought it after reading the reviews. I use it when my hair is still wet before blow drying. Then I spray again and before using my straightener. It seems to give my hair body and shine. Some days after blow drying I can even manage to style without using the straightener. I also spray a little after finishing my styling…after using hairspray. I really love this and feel ot is making my hair look and feel healthier. I don't want to ever run out!
faceoff_positive.headline: My Favorite

faceoff_negative.comments: I have used this for years and loved it. When I saw the new bottle I compared the ingredients. Changed. I don't know if it's the new formula or the spray nozzle (or both) but it leaks EVERYWHERE now. It runs down my arm. I rinse it multiple times during and after use in hot water which does little to help. I end up EVERY time giving up before I have enough on my hair because I am so stressed with the mess dripping off of my elbow and the water everywhere from frequent rapid rinsing in hot water. I have to leave the bottle on the counter all of the time because of the mess. It is a complete WASTE of money now. I will be moving on. AG, you knew better than this cheap switch. Most would be willing to pay more for the quality product we were used to. Save money elsewhere- not at the expense of quality. Fail.
faceoff_negative.headline: Changed formulation and ? spray nozzle
